main event: A yellowish red spherical object was observed traversing the night sky, but details regarding the time of sighting and specific observations were not clear due to document quality.
interesting points: The color of the object was described as yellowish red., The shape of the object was reported as spherical., The speed of the object was noted to be twice that of man., There is a mention of a possibility that other similar observations are commonly categorized as fire balls., The document discusses actions taken by the Air Force regarding such observations.
witness description: A representative from Sangamo Electric Company who reported an observation of an object over the last year.
